tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SecurityIncident (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  severity INTEGER NOT NULL,
  reported_by TEXT NOT NULL,
  reported_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentResolution (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INTEGER REFERENCES SecurityIncident (id),
  resolution_summary TEXT NOT NULL,
  resolved_by TEXT NOT NULL,
  resolved_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Security_Incidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_name VARCHAR(255),
    incident_description TEXT,
    severity ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
    status ENUM('Open', 'Closed'),
    datetime_occurred TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Incident_Resolution (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    resolution_description TEXT,
    resolved_by VARCHAR(255),
    datetime_resolved TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES Security_Incidents(id)
);
